attributes.action: Encourage false teeth for dangerous dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of "putting down " dangerous dogs or banning pit bulls etc. surely a better option would be to fit them with false teeth.These would only be used at feeding tmes and removed afterwoods,I have never heard of anyone being gummed to death by any breed of dog 
Goodbye,and happy everything

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
